document.full_text: at least 59 soldiers and militiamen were killed and dozens wounded on thursday in clashes between the south sudan army and local militia groups in three oil-producing states, the southern army (spla) said on friday.
document.title: south sudan army-militia clashes kill 69: army
lines_and_colors: at least 59 soldiers and militiamen were killed and dozens wounded on thursday in clashes between the south sudan army and local militia groups in three oil-producing states, the southern army (spla) said on friday.
